item.title: Everything You Need to Know About USB Ports and Speeds (2025)
item.description: USB-C was supposed to make everything simple. Instead, it’s more complicated than ever. So let's clear up the confusion.

item.title: This Is Why You Should Try Ultralight Backpacking (2025)
item.description: You can camp in the backcountry with under 10 pounds of gear and be warm, comfortable, and fed. Here's WIRED's guide to shedding weight.

item.title: Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme Performance Puts Pressure Back on Intel and Apple
item.description: We ran some early benchmarks on reference units to see how Qualcomm's new Snapdragon X2 Elite chip stacks up to the competition.

item.title: The Best Smart Rings, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: A svelte smart ring can track important health metrics and doesn’t need to be charged every day.

item.title: The 3 Best Coffee Subscription Deals for National Coffee Day 2025
item.description: National Coffee Day is September 29. See how to get half off WIRED's favorite 3 coffee subscriptions.
